load_constants.h Author
@Kevin-Caldwell
Abstractions for Loading .CONST files
Features Custom .CONST file format with easy-to-read Constant Parameter Storage
Uses Interpreting .CONST Files to load constants for all modules Stores result in a HashTable structure
Dependencies hash_table.h
Internal Dependencies stdio.h
